title: 33 - What About Mimi?
description: This week, Karen and Georgia talk the increasingly surreal Jane Mixer case along with the Co-ed Killer and then recount the incredible survival of Jennifer Morey. Come have tea with us, Rosemary & Thyme style on My Favorite Murder.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
